CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 1, reads: "Republicans Urge Equal Rights for All Citizens in Campaign Platform for '58." Portion of accompanying article reads: "The Republican State Committee met at Hotel Webster Hall last Saturday morning and adopted a campaign platform pledging equal rights for all Pennsylvania citizens in fields of education, employment, organized labor and housing..."
TitMainTitle: Man, and three women, possibly including Patricia Nixon on left, seated in Webster Hall during Republican State Committee meeting
